website_summaries.verdict: A nice screen that includes setup accessories for a decent price, and it's available in four versatile sizes.
pros: Vivid screen made of durable materials that's available in several sizes
Comes with all the accessories you need for setup, including tethers, a storage bag, and a blower
cons: Larger screen can be unstable in windy conditions

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. This huge screen inflated in a matter of minutes. You do need to keep the fan going to keep it inflated, but the fan is quiet enough that you quickly forget about it. When the movie's done, the screen quickly deflates by way of a zippered opening. It folds up and fits nicely in the included storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lauber

customer_reviews.title: Making it hold still
customer_reviews.text: When i put it up the side hooks was either to high or ropes was to short it keep moving forward or back it was horrible so i use the end of each ropes on the sides to hold forward from falling back then i put the other ropes on top of each left and right clip on screen and threw it back to ground from falling forward and it held perfect loved it after my own invention lol
customer_reviews.author: dandiaz

customer_reviews.title: Best. Drunk purchase. EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids think I'm a hero, my neighbors respect me more than ever before, and we are going to start doing movie nights in our back meadow as a fundraiser for our kid's school. This thing is high quality and AWESOME!!! Sets up in about 5 minutes. It definitely helps if you have something to tie it off to, as I don't think the tiny stakes they send it with would hold up in any wind. And in these days of COVID, it is easy to socially distance and hang out with friends while watching movies outside. Definitely recommend! Last week was Princess Bride, tonight is Holy Grail.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Jordahl

customer_reviews.title: I love this screen!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So excited to have a movie night in my yard.🥰🥰🥰
customer_reviews.author: Regina Ford

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a screen that I could setup quickly and was big enough to see around my yard during parties. This was perfect. Very easy to setup and the screen quality is perfect. I would have given it 5 stars with if they would include larger spikes to hold the anchor ropes, the small plastic ones are useless, I ended up using cinder blocks to hold it in place. The fan works great and is fairly quiet, but again, the spikes are to small and it tips over easily and can cut off the air supply causing the screen to deflate, I ended up using metal tent spikes and it did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better then the homemade screen I had before. The only thing I can say bad is that the bottom of the screen is a little higher then I like. Some reviews complain about a seam across the screen, I don't have a seam across mine. Takes 10 minutes to set up. I have figured out to spike it to the ground before inflating.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Does not work even in a slight breeze
customer_reviews.text: The screen is unusable. Tried to use it tonight and even a small breeze collapses the screen We had all the ties and all stakes deployed. Whoever thought that the tie points should be in the middle of the column doesn’t understand basic engineering The tie points should be at the top of the columns at the corners, as well as a midpoint at the top th goes to the back. Do not buy this, look at other options
customer_reviews.author: Stryker

customer_reviews.title: Great social distance fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Quick easy to blow up. Very impressive set up for the price. The fans a little loud but not too overbearing. The wrinkles are hard to see once projected image lights up. I'd upgrade the size of the stakes to longer ones. The little ones it came with do pull out of the ground depending on wind and ground composition. Use caution with the bag and black blow up screen frame. The black is not colorfast and if it gets wet it'll stain the white screen. Be cautious of any moisture including dew. Best practice for me so far is to roll the screen up to minimize the wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: curt reinholz

customer_reviews.title: Love! Perfect for entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this. We setup in our backyard and it was perfect. We purchased the projector that was recommended and it had everything we needed to hookup to our MacBook. We had trouble with the ropes on the side so we had to YouTube how to set this part up. Once it was dark the movie showed perfectly. Very easy to setup and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent outdoor theater!
customer_reviews.text: What a fun, easy to setup experience! My new 17’ screen is EVERYTHING I hoped it would be!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Fedele

customer_reviews.title: Love it but would be nice if.....
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Everyone is impressed with it but here are a few improvements needed 1. The machine is noisy to blow into it. Would be great if it was quieter for our neighbors. 2. The attachment to the air blower and flat screen is not very secure. Should have a rubber device to tighten it better than a tie on. 3. The bag to put the item away won’t work - we bought a plastic container but nice if it was included. 4. Have printed directions was is top and bottom would solve so MUCH TIME!
customer_reviews.author: AMV

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for football games! My daughter loves watching princess movies on it too... The screen is huuge! Comes up and down in 5 minutes... You just need some practice. When putting away, I always roll it up twice to make sure all air is out. It makes a difference and only takes an extra minute. Blower is a bit louder than what I would like, but once the game is on or the movie is playing, you hardly notice it.
customer_reviews.author: Jolly Roger

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Screen
customer_reviews.text: This inflatable screen has been a huge hit with my 21 year old and her friends. It was so easy to set up and the motor is not too loud. If you sit 10 feet away you cannot hear the motor at all. We have added two Bluetooth speakers just to have more sound options. This is great for watching movies or playing games. Everyone who has seen it loves it and is impressed. I would buy this item again without a moments hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Renee M. Gorski

customer_reviews.title: Nice size & Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love having outdoor movie nights because of this screen. I purchased the 17ft screen and I love the size. It's bigger than I imagined. Easy to assemble but you will need to purchase metal stakes instead of using the plastic ones that come with the screen to keep sturdy in softer turf.
customer_reviews.author: C.J.

customer_reviews.title: Separate motor and no instructions
customer_reviews.text: my screen came with a separate motor and it doesn't stay connected to the screen. It's also really loud. It didn't come with a manual and the videos online show a different model with the fan as part of the screen rather the completely separate one I got. I will return this and I extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Raemi

customer_reviews.title: No reverse projection available
customer_reviews.text: The structure is great and the screen is great for front projection. Our old inflatable screen could be projected from behind so the cords and projector weren't in the way. This one doesn't have that option since the back of the screen is black.
customer_reviews.author: book lover

customer_reviews.title: Overall good but beware of wind when setting up.
customer_reviews.text: We ended up returning this . We had mixed reviews on this: Negative: the main reason why we returned this was because we wanted this to replace our two person (set up) non-blower screen. Yes, a single person could set this up but if there’s a little bit of wind , you would have to fight with this blowing over. We replaced this one To one that had an A frame style support. 100% better. Positive: compact, easy to store, screen is removable, bottom of the screen sits three feet or so off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: HamItUp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: We used this screen for the first time yesterday. It worked great! It was very easy to put up and take down. We thoroughly enjoyed our social distancing pizza and movie on the deck get together. One of the things that I particularly like about it is that the bottom of the screen itself is a few feet off the ground, which makes for easier viewing than the types on which the bottom of the screen is almost to the ground. Also, I love the clip on screen vs the Velcro attached screens. Buy with confidence and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: A. Roby

customer_reviews.title: Huge! But motor doesn't have enough power
customer_reviews.text: Blower motor is not strong enough to inflate. Had to use my bounce house blower.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy buyer
customer_reviews.text: Upon unboxing my screen I noticed a buckle was broke and also the white screen had big dirty boot foot prints on it. Makes me think it had been returned and then reboxed to be sold as a new screen. Needless to say I was NOT happy! Going to attempt to contact company for a replacement buckle. For the money I spent I should not have had these issues to complain about 😡
customer_reviews.author: Kayla D S

customer_reviews.title: Buy buy buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 20 foot blow up screen and never felt better. Luckily we have a big back yard and only suggest buying this size If you do. My family and friends were recently invited to a bonfire and movie night and raves about it greatly! The price was solid and the view is amazing! One draw back but my handy man took care of, was the blower for the 20foot is big and a little loud. So he extended the blower by adding a duck work flex hose I think you call it and put the blower on the side of the house! We could No longer hear it and it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Janee Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Over all awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This screen is large! It's clear (except for a couple wrinkle) and sets up easily. The first one came with a tear in the seam but it was a quick swap out and good to go. It's not built like a bounce house so don't expect it to last years without some sort of problem but it should do great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Retro Fighter

customer_reviews.title: Huge Screen - great for family movie night
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this - the screen was HUGE! The kids loved it. The screen itself had some wrinkles that were still visible during the movie, but not too terribly distracting. Likewise with the blower motor - you could hear it, but not distracting. We are all looking forward to the next movie night!
customer_reviews.author: SweetMusic

customer_reviews.title: I screen, you screen, we all ejoyed movies on this screen!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this product after ordering the 20 foot screen, by the same company failed to be delivered. I did receive my money back, but was hesitant. But the product arrived and made our family 4th a lot of fun. Instead of fireworks when the sun went down, we watched a movie. The screen had a few wrinkles that I hope will smooth out over time,but in no way took away from the enjoyment we had. A friend loaned us his amazing sound system, which enhanced the experience. I cannot wait to use this screen again!
customer_reviews.author: N COOK

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again, just hoping for no damages.
customer_reviews.text: We opened this wonderful surprise and it had a hole in the left side. Well, since we were having a very small movie night of six close friends, we proceeded to tape the hole and show movies. We have to return it because we want one that isn't damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Harris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome screen for the money, fans a bit loud
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I couldn’t believe how big it is, but it is perfect. I have only minor gripes, one, the fan is relatively loud, and the part of the screen that attaches to the fan should have elastic to help keep it tight. Other than that, it is great, and comes with a big bag so there are no problems packing it back up.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Dipko

customer_reviews.title: Great screen
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I just hosted my daughter's birthday using this screen for movie night. It's awesome. Easy up easy down. Well made and great value. Buy it, just buy it
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Nice inflatable screen.
customer_reviews.text: I love this for a movie night in the backyard. You do hear the motor, but it is reasonably quiet. It helps to have some basic camping knots in your repertoire for the ropes. It deflates immediately if the motor is unplugged. The provided tent stakes are small and not adequate, especially if on uneven ground. Plan on investing in larger stakes.
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: Great screen!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this screen so we could have a socially distant / quarantine block party in our cul de sac (each household staying in own yard)! The set up was so easy, I did it with the help of my four year old. It took us 3 minutes. The pic is great and we are enjoying using it during this quarantine here in AZ! Too beautiful to not find a way to enjoy the outdoors! Definitely recommend for purchase! My friend just bought the screen for her cabin in Northern AZ too!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Set up and blower noise
customer_reviews.text: This screen is just amazing. It set up so fast. We could not hear the blower at all once the movie started. I’m so happy with this purchase. If your thinking about buying one you should just go for it. You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Screen
customer_reviews.text: After going through many inflatable outdoor screen options (and returning many) this was by far the best - the clips on the screen make it incredibly easy to set up where other models of this size that leverage velcro are cumbersome and challenging to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Iodice

customer_reviews.title: It was worth the price. Would purchase it again!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I received a smaller than expected box, but it turned out to be Perfect! My 4 year old and I put it together. The wind was blowing a little, but the ties and stacks held it in Place. It was also east to pack into the carrying bag along with the blower. The only problem was I had to wait until the sun went down some for the picture to show clearly. I would definitely Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a outside bday party and the people was amazed they thought i rented it but the price was so good i bought it i cant wait for summer to use it again !
customer_reviews.author: nicholas

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Since we are stuck home this summer, like most people, we wanted to add some fun to our yard. We love the screen and watch movies 2-4 times every week. We have also had a few people over to watch movies and the huge screen size and quality are awesome. The blower is also quiet so it doesn't disturb the film.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Nealon

customer_reviews.title: Does not have an internal blower!
customer_reviews.text: Product says that it has an internal blower, but there is nothing internal about this. If I didn’t need for my daughters birthday, I would return right away. It is big and inflates, but the 18’ screen is not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: northern_1

customer_reviews.title: Such a great movie screen
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely 💯 love rhis screen. So easy to put up and take down. I would 💯 percent recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nyr4evr

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor fun
customer_reviews.text: Can see the wrinkles, but love the size and ease of use. We give it 5 stars for fun.
customer_reviews.author: dat4931

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy t put up. Easy to take down. Easy to clean. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: louie79

customer_reviews.title: Great quality screen
customer_reviews.text: This screen is awesome! We could still see some creases in the screen during first time use, but didn’t bother us. The screen was easy to assemble and set up. Best purchase for summer night relaxing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this screen. We have had multiple movie nights in the lawn. We love doing this!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Greatest thing since sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: The greatest thing ever! At first we thought 20 ft was too big, as seen by me standing next to it, but it is the perfect size! Took about 15 minutes to completely set up, and about 10 to disassemble. Motor is quiet, and looking at the screen, motor is on the right side. 10 out of 10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Bray

customer_reviews.title: Best screen
customer_reviews.text: Great investment easy to set very big screen I recommend this screen
customer_reviews.author: Tita

customer_reviews.title: Movie night by the fire.
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to setup and teardown. Great quality...so much better than the bed sheet we were using ;^)
customer_reviews.author: Michael McRae

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor movies
customer_reviews.text: We love this projector - perfect for the year of less travel and staycations. Takes 5-10 minutes to completely set up fully inflated. Tear down is maybe 5 minutes and it fits in the bag. No troubles for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing all around! Folds into basically nothing, easy to blow up and deflate due to the zipper compartment that allows air to escape quickly. Motor works well, not super loud which is nice. Extremely well made inflatable/screen. And a bag to carry it all in! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Screen is great for the price and size. Unfortunately, for me it was way larger then what I expected or needed but if you are looking for a massive outdoor screen at a reasonable price this is a great option!
customer_reviews.author: van

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this !!!!! Only two issues, ropes aren’t long enough and stakes aren’t strong enough
customer_reviews.author: kaylei j.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! I am so happy i bought this. That buckle system versus the Velcro is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used for outdoor movies during warm summer evenings. It worked well for us. The picture from my projector was great.
customer_reviews.author: KTB

customer_reviews.title: Great Movie Screen
customer_reviews.text: We tried another screen before this one. So easy to put up and take down. We replaced the plastic stakes with some metals ones that work much better. Over all, great screen and picture
customer_reviews.author: Deborah T.

customer_reviews.title: Great screen!
customer_reviews.text: Love this so far. Way bigger than expected and pretty easy to set up. Putting it away was quite simple as well. Purchased another as a gift for family.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Best buy Ever
customer_reviews.text: We are a huge family that loves to have family movie nights. We decided to get this screen and it is by far the best purchase we have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: ecsanchez

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid item and a good deal. Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Sidgenicroskin

customer_reviews.title: Great but came with holes
customer_reviews.text: Product is great but quality control not so. Had a tiny two holes In it. Doesn’t seem to cause any issues but not happy after paying almost 300 for it.
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: Huge Screen!
customer_reviews.text: This screen works well and it’s huge. Wish I would have bought sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We used this screen for a family function. Great size, easy to put together. Not loud at all! My family & I love it and will get lots of use out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Lennan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing screen
customer_reviews.text: Amazing screen. Very easy to setup and the blower motor is super quiet.
customer_reviews.author: OswegoJones

customer_reviews.title: Not for windy day
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of difficulty during assembly because of wind, the stakes that were included with the product are not strong enough to keep the screen up. Other than this the size is great and everyone loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Easy to assemble and destruct. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy lambert

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME outdoor movie screen
customer_reviews.text: It was a great hit at my grandsons birthday drive in party. we have had several neighbor movie nights since then.
customer_reviews.author: PENNI FUENTES

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase ❤️
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to assemble and to take down. Very clear screen.
customer_reviews.author: cam

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Easy to setup and take down. Only issue the storage bag was not big enough. I purchased a duffle bag to store the screen
customer_reviews.author: Brian Doiron

customer_reviews.title: Sending this back
customer_reviews.text: The screen does not fit properly, but it does not fully inflate to stand erect
customer_reviews.author: Shayhova

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, my family loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, needs 2 ppl to hold up while getting it in the ground. And it’s huge very excited and impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Batman_bruceway

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Easy to install and to put it away! My kids loved it! Great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup easy
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase by far. It was an easy set up. Above all the perfect size for Our backyards movie nights.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Estrella

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up but even with just a little wind you cant use it
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bennefield

customer_reviews.title: Love it great for a family gathering
customer_reviews.text: Awesome my family and I love it and easy to set up I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Paul Groseclose

customer_reviews.title: Sound
customer_reviews.text: They don’t mention that the blower must be on continuously, hard to hear the movie.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product.Work perfect for pool parties and movie night in the back yard
customer_reviews.author: Latricia brite

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: This screen is amazing! So easy to set up and the picture quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: lindsay lambrich

product_meta.title: VIVOHOME 14 Feet Indoor and Outdoor Inflatable Blow up Mega Movie Projector Screen with Carry Bag for Front Projection
product_meta.description:
Size:14ftBrand Profile:
VIVOHOME is a US registered trademark based on California. We are devote ourselves to offering high quality products at the most reasonable prices. Hope you could find your favorite collections from us.

Product Specification:
-Material: 210D Oxford
-Condition: 100% Brand New
-Package Dimensions: 19"L*15"W*8"H
-Item Weight: 11lbs

How To Use
1.Open and spread out the screen frame on the ground with clips to hold the screen on top side.
2.Open screen and attach onto clips all around screen
3.Plug in blower and hold opening firmly so it does not suck in dirt and other items
4.Once fully inflated, you can go adjust screen straps to ensure screen is snug. Do not worry about having wrinkles as this special material reflects images well despite wrinkles.
5.Stand up screen and use ground stakes to hold bottom of frame to ground using 4 rings at front and back of legs.
6.Attach 2 ropes on each side ring and go out at a 45 degree angle from frame and attach rope to stakes in ground 

Package Include:
-1 x 420D Storage Bag with Zipper
-8 x Ground Stakes
-4 x Ropes

Product Warranty:
We assure the item you received is 100% safe and sound. For any defective item, please contact our customer service for satisfaction guaranteed solution.
feature_bullets: ENJOY THE MOVIE OUTDOORS - Enjoy your favorite films on the big screen anytime with your family and friends in backyard. A nice addition to resorts, outdoor parties, and special events
DURABLE MATERIAL - Made of high quality, durable 210D Oxford cloth. Long-lasting weather-resistant material allows long time indoor or outdoor use

QUICK INFLATED - Quiet fan pump included can blow up this movie screen in minutes and keeps it inflated throughout the show when plugged in, so that you don't have to spend a lot of time setting it up. REMEMBER ZIP UP the zipper before inflating

EASY SET UP - This projector comes with a free-standing mount type with an aspect ratio of 16:9. Tethers, yard stakes, a professional built in 85W air blower and a 420D oxford handy bag are included for easy setup and storage
EASY TO CLEAN & STORAGE - After your event, this blow up movie screen collapses for fast clean-up and convenient storage. Removable projection surface make it easy to clean and maintain your screen

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars468 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
